sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At least five people have been killed as heavy thunderstorms ripped through the Balkans region after days of soaring heat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: New Zealand is rocked by a deadly shooting in Auckland, just hours before the city hosts the opening game of the FIFA Women's World Cup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Serbia's capital Belgrade was among several cities in the Balkans to be hit by powerful storms following days of soaring temperatures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Wind gusts brought down power lines leaving areas without electricity and the airport was temporarily closed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Croatia the storm suddenly darkened the sky and brought blinding rain, flash floods and winds across Zagreb from 4pm, halting the city's transportation, causing power outages and leaving streets blocked.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Zagreb's emergency services have asked citizens to be patient as hundreds of calls for help came at once.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Two men died when a tree fell on them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Slovakia, authorities say tens of thousands of people were left without power and scores of campers have been evacuated from their campsites as strong winds overturned their tents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Across the region, storms have left chaos behind and injured dozens, from rooftops being ripped off to falling trees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A gunman killed two people and injured six others in a shooting on a construction site

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: in New Zealand's largest city, Auckland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The authorities have confirmed the gunman also died at the scene.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A police officer was among the injured but was able to walk to an ambulance with help from colleagues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: No motive has been given, but the attack is not thought to have been terror-related.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The offender was armed with a pump action shotgun.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He moved through the building site discharging the firearm as he went.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Upon reaching the upper levels of the building, the man contained himself in an elevator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Shots were fired and he was located a short time later.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The attack comes as Auckland prepares to host the opening game of the Women's World Cup later on Thursday. The construction site was close to the hotel where the Norwegian women's national team has been staying. New Zealand's Prime Minister says there is no national security threat and the tournament will proceed as planned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Protesters in Iraq, angered by the planned burning of a copy of the Quran, have stormed the Swedish embassy in Baghdad, breaking into the compound and causing a fire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Online video showed demonstrators waving flags and signs after protests were called by supporters of a prominent cleric.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This footage showed dozens of the men climbing over the fence at the site and a small fire breaking out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Police and other security officials were called to the scene as dawn broke and smoke continued to rise. Sweden's foreign ministry said in a statement that their embassy staff were safe and condemned the attack as a serious violation of the Vienna Convention. Swedish police on Wednesday granted a permit for a protest outside the Iraqi embassy in Stockholm with media reporting the organisers planned to burn the Muslim holy book.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It comes just weeks after a lone man set fire to pages of the Koran outside Stockholm's main mosque.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It was supposed to be the crowning achievement of his term. Desde el punto de vista de las instituciones europeas, la convocatoria electoral del 23 de julio se sentó como un jarro de agua fría.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Brussela se mantendrá a un ojo cerca en las elecciones este sábado, contestadas por el Partido Socialista de Pedro Sánchez y el Partido Popular de Alberto Núñez Viejo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: ¿Qué podría significar una coalición potencial con el Partido Vox de la derecha para la aquello que tiene que ver con Bruselas y con la Unión Europea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Es decir, podemos decir que a grandes rasgos están de acuerdo, hay sintonía.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: En la mesa hay un importante acuerdo europeo, como la política de migración y la transición ecológica.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Hay un discurso con evocaciones en materias que son muy sensibles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sin mayorías absolutas a la vista, las últimas encuestas apuntan a que la presidencia del gobierno de España se decidirá por un puñado de escaños el próximo domingo 23 de julio.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Será una noche de infarto también en Bruselas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: En Madrid, Jaime Veláz 5 million euros in humanitarian aid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's also said that it'll investigate how Irish-made components ended up in Iranian suicide drones used by Russia. Meanwhile, images of Ukrainian grain warehouses in flames after being attacked by Russia have sparked panic in the markets. According to Ukraine, at least 60,000 tons of wheat were destroyed in the overnight attacks in the Odessa region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The price of wheat rose more than 8% in the aftermath of the fires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russia's President Vladimir Putin this week pulled out of a deal to allow grain to be exported through Black Sea ports and insists it does not make sense to renew the agreement when the West refuses to lift sanctions imposed on Russian agricultural exports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The South African government has confirmed that Russian President Vladimir Putin will not travel to the country next month to attend a BRICS summit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Putin is subject to an arrest warrant by the International Criminal Court to which South Africa is a signatory. That means that they would be responsible for detaining him should he enter the country. But Moscow has made it clear that any such move would be tantamount to a declaration of war against Russia. BRICS is an acronym for Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa, and the group is held by some as an alternative to the G7.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A spokesman for the South African president, Cyril Ramaphosa, said that the Russian foreign minister Sergei Lavrov will represent Putin at the summit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin has denied issuing any warning to Cape Town, but insists that everyone knows what the arrest of the Russian president would mean. Putin is wanted by the ICC in connection with the kidnapping of Ukrainian children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Fiona Scott Morton, chosen as the chief economist for competition at the European Commission,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: has withdrawn following a storm of objections mainly led by France. The EU commissioner for competition, Margrethe Vestager, said on Twitter she will accept her decision with regret and full respect for her integrity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Scott Morrison, being non-European, as well as her past work as a consultant for the big tech companies, such as Apple and Microsoft, that the EU Commission has under its radar, were the main sources of criticism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And many MEPs were not convinced by Vestager's answers. à la Commission européenne un chiffre économiste qui ne soit pas européen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Et avec ceci, avec cette nationalité américaine, des questions se posaient notamment en matière d'accès aux informations confidentielles et de conflits d'intérêts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Pour beaucoup, c'était Macron lui-même qui a tué la nomination, comme il a ouvertement suggéré qu'il serait mieux d'avoir un grand Européen pour le travail, dans le contexte de son philosophie constante pour l'autonomie stratégique de l'UE. as he openly suggested that it would be better to get a great European for the job in the context of his constant philosophy for EU strategic autonomy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: For others, this is sending their own message to the world's top experts for an introvert approach from Europe's side, despite the fact that they all agree there were legitimate questions raised.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I think her US citizenship played a very important role and I think it's a stupid argument to take this as the main argument to oppose I think the EU should attract more experts from different parts of the world and the message we are sending now is that if you do if you're a new a citizen or maybe coming from an Asian country, then you're not welcome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A few days ago, the major political groups at the European Parliament sent a letter to Vestager expressing dismay over the appointment of Fiona Scott Morton as chief competition economist, while a group of commissioners also raised concerns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has apologised in Parliament for the historical treatment of LGBT veterans who were sacked or forced out of the military for being gay.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This comes after a report recommending a public apology and compensation for the victims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Until as recently as the year 2000, it was illegal to be gay in the British military even though homosexuality was decriminalised in the UK in 1967.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The report said before the ban was lifted there had been shocking accounts of homophobia, bullying, blackmail and sexual assaults.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Kenyan police fired tear gas at protesters as three days of planned anti-government demonstrations erupted on the streets of Nairobi against the rising cost of living.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Schools and businesses have been closed with people afraid of getting caught up in the violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last week, at least 14 people died during demonstrations. Ten were shot dead by police. It is the third time this month that opposition leader Raila Odinga has staged mass rallies against a government he says is illegitimate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In a rare sign of public opposition to Taliban orders, dozens of Afghan women have held a protest against a nationwide beauty salon ban.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Afghan women have held a protest against a nationwide beauty salon ban. Beauticians and makeup artists along with their clients gathered in the capital Kabul.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The women defied security forces who used fire hoses and tasers to break up the protest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Taliban move has drawn international concern about the impact on female entrepreneurs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They say the salons are forbidden by Islam.
